column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses nye Aaron
column6: Iyinom nye mbowa a hom ndzi wɔ asaase do mbowa nyinara mu."

column2: "Anansambowa mu biara a wɔapaa n'anansa mu
"Naaso iyinom na mma hom nndzi wɔ hɔn a wɔkosa adzepuwii
column3: anaa hɔn a hɔn anansa mu apaa mu: efupɔnkɔ
column6: ntsi no ho nntsew mma hom."

column2: "Na etwabowa
"Na asoaso
"Na preko
column5: naaso ɔnnkosa adzepuwii ntsi no ho nntsew mma hom."

column2: "Mma hom nndzi hɔn nam bi
column3: na hɔn efun so mma hom nnka; hɔn ho nntsew mma hom."

column2: "Iyinom nye dza hom ndzi wɔ dza ɔwɔ nsu mu nyinara mu: biara a ɔwɔ tɛterɛ nye abon wɔ nsu mu
"Na dza wonnyi tɛterɛ nye abon a wɔwɔ pomu
column4: nye dza wɔwɔ nsu mu nyinara a nkwa wɔ hɔn mu no yɛ ekyiwadze ma hom
column6: "na ɔnyɛ hom ekyiwadze; mma hom nndzi hɔn nam

column2: "Adze biara a onnyi tɛterɛ anaa abon wɔ nsu mu no
"Na iyinom na hom nkyir no wɔ ntumbowa mu; mma wonndzi
"na ɔsansaa
"akonkoran biara n'ahorow;"
"nye sohor
"nye patubia
"nye ambɛnpatu
"nye esukɔnkɔn
"Ntumbowa ahorow a wɔnantsew anan anan anan do nyinara yɛ ekyiwadze ma hom."
"Naaso iyinom na hom ndzi no wɔ ntumbowa menyamenya a wɔnantsew anan anan anan do nyinara mu
column3: hɔn a wɔwɔ aperɛ wɔ hɔn anan do a wɔdze huruw wɔ asaase do no
column5: "mekyerɛ hɔn mu iyinom na hom ndzi; mbɛbɛw n'ahorow

column2: "Na ntumbowa menyamenya nyinara a wɔwɔ anan anan anan no
"Na iyinom na hom dze gu homho fi: obiara a ɔka hɔn fun no
column3: no ho nntsew ara kodu ewimbir:"

column2: "Na obiara a ɔsoa hɔn fun no ɔnhor ne ntar
column3: osiandɛ no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir."

column2: "Anansabowa biara a wɔapaa n'anansa mu
column5: no ho nntsew mma hom; obiara a ɔka hɔn no

column2: "Na abowa biara a ɔnantsew no werɛw ano no wɔ mbowa a wɔnantsew anan anan do nyinara mu no
column3: hɔn ho nntsew mma hom: obiara a ɔka hɔn fun no
column4: no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir."

column2: "Na nyia ɔsoa hɔn fun no ɔnhor ne ntar
column3: na no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir: hɔn ho nntsew mma hom."

column2: "Na iyinom nye hɔn a hɔn ho nntsew mma hom wɔ aweaweambowa a wɔwea wɔ asaase do no mu; obirebi
"Iyinom nye hɔn a hɔn ho nntsew mma hom wɔ dza wɔwea nyinara mu: sɛ wowu a
column4: no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir."

column2: "Na adze biara a hɔn mu dza oewu atɔ do no
column3: no ho nntsew; dua adze o
column7: adze biara a wɔdze yɛ edwuma biara
column9: na no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir; ansaana no ho atsew."

column2: "Na dɛtsesɛn biara a hɔn mu bi bɔtɔ mu no
column3: adze biara a ɔwɔ mu no no ho nntsew
column4: na sɛn no hom mbɔ no."

column2: "No mu edziban a wodzi biara a nsu bogu mu no
column3: no ho nntsew: na anondze nyinara a wɔnom wɔ dɛm adze biara mu no

column2: "Na adze biara a hɔn fun no bi bɔtɔ do no no ho nntsew; fononoo o
column4: wombubu no esinesin: hɔn ho nntsew
column5: na hɔn ho nntsew mma hom."

column2: "Naaso nsubura anaa amona a nsu egyina mu no dze
column3: no ho tsew: mbom dza ɔka hɔn fun no

column2: "Na sɛ hɔn fun bi tɔ ekuadze a woedua biara do a
"Mbom sɛ wɔdze nsu gu ekuadze no do a
column3: na hɔn fun bi tɔ do a
column4: ekuadze no ho nntsew mma hom."

column2: "Na sɛ abowa biara a hom dzi wu a
column4: no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir."

column2: "Na nyia odzi no fun bi no
column4: na no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir: onyia so a ɔsoa no fun no
column6: na no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir."

column2: "Na aweaweabowa biara a ɔwea wɔ asaase do no
"Adze biara a ɔnam ɔyafun do
column3: nye adze biara a ɔnam anan anan do
column4: anaa adze biara a ɔwɔ anan pii
column5: mekyerɛ aweaweambowa a wɔwea wɔ asaase do nyinara
column6: mma hom nndzi; na wɔyɛ ekyiwadze."

column2: "Mma hom nnyɛ homho ekyiwadze wɔ aweaweabowa biara a ɔwea ho
column3: nkyii so mma hom nnyɛ homho fi a ɔmma hom ho nntsew wɔ hɔn ho."

column2: "Na emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn: dɛm ntsi hom ntsew homho
column3: na hom nyɛ krɔnkrɔn; osiandɛ meyɛ krɔnkrɔn. Nkyii so mma hom nngu homho fi wɔ aweaweabowa biara a otwuw noho adze wɔ asaase do no ho."

column2: "Na emi nye EWURADZE a miyii hom fii Egypt asaase do bae
column3: dɛ meyɛ hom Nyankopɔn no; dɛm ntsi hom nyɛ krɔnkrɔn

column2: "Iyi nye anansabowa
column4: nye abowa biara a ɔwɔ nsu mu na abowa biara a ɔwea wɔ asaase do no ho mbra:"

column2: "ma wɔdze apa adze a no ho nntsew nye dza no ho tsew mu
column3: na adze a nkwa wɔ mu a wodzi nye dza nkwa wɔ mu a wonndzi mu."
